images.description: SDSS image of elliptical galaxy PGC 37080, which is either NGC 3926 or the eastern member of that NGC object, also showing PGC 37079, which may be the western half of NGC 3926 or a completely separate object

SDSS image of elliptical galaxy PGC 37080, which is either NGC 3926 or the eastern member of that NGC object, also showing PGC 37079, which may be the western half of NGC 3926 or a completely separate object
SDSS image of lenticular galaxy PGC 37079, which may be part of NGC 3926, or merely an optical double with that NGC object
